alert.note: Alert for Middle Rio Grande Valley, Albuquerque Metro Area; Sandia, Manzano Mountains Including Edgewood (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 17 at 4:21PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF BERNALILLO COUNTY THROUGH 500 PM MDT... At 420 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking thunderstorms near South Valley, or 10 miles southwest of Albuquerque, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Albuquerque, southwestern Rio Rancho, Corrales, Los Ranchos De Albuquerque, Paradise Hills, South Valley, Sandia Heights, North Valley, Isleta Pueblo and Alameda. This includes the following highways... Interstate 40 between Mile Markers 140 and 168. Interstate 25 between Mile Markers 208 and 235. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If threatening weather approaches your area, take shelter in a sturdy building. Blowing dust associated with thunderstorm winds can reduce visibilities below one quarter mile at times.

area.areaDesc: Middle Rio Grande Valley, Albuquerque Metro Area; Sandia, Manzano Mountains Including Edgewood
